description: This file defines the main component of a simple Todo app built with React Native. It manages todos with features such as add, edit, delete, toggle completion, and filtering. It includes UI elements like a list, modal dialogs for input, and a floating action button.

methods.name: openAddModal
methods.description: Opens the modal dialog to add a new todo item.

methods.name: openEditModal
methods.description: Opens the modal dialog to edit existing todo identified by id.

methods.name: saveTodo
methods.description: Saves a new todo or updates an existing one after validation.

methods.name: toggleComplete
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of a todo identified by id.

methods.name: deleteTodo
methods.description: Deletes a todo, with confirmation prompts.

methods.name: clearCompleted
methods.description: Clears all completed todos with confirmation.

methods.name: renderItem
methods.description: Renders a single todo item in the list.

methods.name: FilterChip
methods.description: A component for filter selection buttons.
